scripts.build:all: bun run build && bun run docs:build
scripts.test:docker: docker build -f Dockerfile.test -t shift-css-test . && docker run --rm -v $(pwd)/packages/core/tests/e2e/snapshots:/app/packages/core/tests/e2e/snapshots shift-css-test bun run --cwd packages/core test:visual
scripts.test:docker:update: docker build -f Dockerfile.test -t shift-css-test . && docker run --rm -v $(pwd)/packages/core/tests/e2e/snapshots:/app/packages/core/tests/e2e/snapshots shift-css-test sh -c 'cd packages/core && bunx playwright test --update-snapshots --project=visual-chrome'
